channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MD
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MD

item.title: Report X-2023080527
item.description:
Report X-2023080527

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-28T18:15:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-30
  • City: WHITE MARSH
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED FROM THE TRAILER, ALREADY LEAKING BADLY. THE PACKAGE HANDLER JUST PUT THE PACKAGE OFF TO THE SIDE AWAY FROM ANYTHING THEY WERE WORKING. DescribePack: HE LID HAD WORKED ITSELF COMPLETELY OFF, AND MORE THAN HALF OF THE CONENTS SPILLED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: I IMMEDIATELY WENT OVER TO THE UNLOAD TO GET THE BOX. I PUT THE LID ON THE LEAKING JUG, THEN PLACED THE ENTIRE PACKAGE INSIDE A BIN LINED WITH A HEAVY DUTY HAZMAT BAG.

item.title: Report X-2023080312
item.description:
Report X-2023080312

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: BELTSVILLE
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS LOADED TO THE VAN WHEN IT WAS DISCOVERED BY THE PACKAGE HANDLER THAT IT WAS LEAKING. UPON DISCOVERY THE VAN LINE MANAGER PLACED IT IN A LINED HAZ TOTE AND BROUGHT IT TO THE DESIGNATED AREA FOR DAMAGED HAZARDOUS MATERIALS PACKAGES. DescribePack: THE INNER BOTTLES WERE PLACED UPSIDE DOWN AGAINST THE INDICATION OF THE ORIENTATION ARROWS. IN ADDITION THE CAPS FAILED CAUSING EVENTUALLY THE LEAK. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A HAZ TOTE IMMEDIATELY UPON DISCOVERY

item.title: Report X-2023080306
item.description:
Report X-2023080306

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-23
  • City: HAGERSTOWN
  • State: MD
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PACKAGE WAS SENT UP THE SORTATION BELTS AND CAME DOWN THE LOADSIDE CHUTE LEAKING. A FIRST AID WAS SUBMITTED FOR A MANAGER AND A PACKAGE HANDLER DUE TO THE LEAKAGE. DescribePack: THE CAP CAME OFF THE PLASTIC JUG CAUSING A HALF GALLON TO LEAK OUT. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE PACKAGE WAS PLACED IN A LINED TOTE FOR PROCESSING. AMPHOMAG POWDER WAS USED TO NEUTRALIZE THE AFFECTED SURFACE AREA.
